meanings.definition: The act of annexing something again.
meanings.sent1: The reannexation of the lost territory was celebrated by the citizens.
meanings.sent2: The reannexation of the old building to the main campus was necessary for expansion.
meanings.sent3: The reannexation of the missing puzzle piece completed the picture perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The reannexation of the stolen artifact brought closure to the museum's curator.
meanings.sent5: The reannexation of the stray kitten into the family brought joy to everyone.

meanings.definition: The process of rejoining or adding back to a larger entity.
meanings.sent1: After the reannexation of the provinces, the country felt whole again.
meanings.sent2: The reannexation of the separated territories strengthened the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The reannexation of the missing ingredient made the recipe complete.
meanings.sent4: The reannexation of the scattered pieces formed a beautiful mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The reannexation of the isolated island brought prosperity to its inhabitants.
